objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#f8f4f1;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#f1e9e4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#e63946;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#e63946;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='15' fill='white' stroke='#e63946' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='10' fill='#fcfbfa' stroke='#e63946' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='5,3'/><path d='M0,180 L150,160 C250,140 350,200 450,190 C550,180 650,100 750,90 C850,80 950,140 1080,130 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='#e63946' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M0,900 L150,920 C250,940 350,880 450,890 C550,900 650,980 750,990 C850,1000 950,940 1080,950 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='#e63946' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='220' cy='220' r='80' fill='#e63946' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='860' cy='860' r='100' fill='#e63946' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text:
Retro running inspired silhouette
Mesh upper with suede overlays
EVA midsole with rubber outsole
Softfoam+ sockliner for comfort

product_details.name: PUMA Men's St Miler Shoes Sneaker
product_details.description: With a retro running inspired silhouette, this shoe comes in many loud colour executions giving a classic vintage feel. Featuring a mesh upper playing with suede overlays, it offers both a timeless look with a touch of playfulness. Sitting on an EVA midsole and rubber outsole, this tooling ensures all-day comfort, plus, the softfoam+ sockliner provides superior cushioning and optimal comfort for every step of your day.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a lifestyle sneaker advertisement with a modern, clean design and high visual impact. The background features soft pastel gradient tones with subtle decorative wave patterns and translucent geometric shapes to add depth. A bold red header text element (`tagline`) highlights the category message, while a darker subtitle (`heading`) clearly states the product name. Below it, a smaller body of text (`description`) provides key product features in a list format. The right side is visually dominated by a high-resolution product image (`product_image`). Prominently at the bottom-left, there's a bold red price (`price`), accompanied by a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with white button text (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Crimson Red: #e63946 (used for highlights, price, and buttons)
- Off-White: #fcfbfa (background card interior)
- Light Cream Gradient: #f8f4f1 to #f1e9e4 (background canvas)
- Charcoal Grey: #333333 (heading text)
- Mid Grey: #4a4a4a (body text)
- White: #ffffff (button text)
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant red PUMA sneaker, prominently featuring a bold and sporty color palette. The primary color, a dynamic red (#D32F2F), dominates the shoe, covering the mesh, suede overlays, laces, and tongue. A clean, contrasting white (#F5F5F5) is used for the brand logo and the signature PUMA stripe, making these elements stand out crisply. The outsole is a neutral gum brown (#A47149), adding an earthy tone that balances the bold red. The colors blend seamlessly, with gradients of red varying in texture (mesh vs. suede), creating depth while white accents provide clear highlights, ideal for energetic, modern advertisement themes.
